    • Method Detail

      • setNoAddingRequirement

        public void setNoAddingRequirement(DevelopmentCardType cardType)
        Removes all the adding card requirements for a specific card type. Once this method has been called with a specific cardType, each time the player wants to acquire a card of that type he doesn't have to meet the requirements related to the addition of another card (for example, if activated on Territory cards, you won't need to have enough military points to add another territory card.
        Parameters:
        cardType -

      • checkCardsNumReq

        public boolean checkCardsNumReq(CardsNumber req)
        Used to check whether the player has enough territory cards, building cards, venture cards and character cards to meet a specific requirement.
        Parameters:
        req -
        Returns:
        TRUE if the player satisfies the requirements (i.e. : he has at least the number of cards required), FALSE if not.
